item.title: The Invitation of the Master
item.description:
The Invitation of the Master by Elder John Sonnenberg, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 155th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 1985
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder John Sonnenberg, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: Look to the Savior
item.description:
Look to the Savior by Elder John Sonnenberg, Released member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 159th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 1989
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
